926080.name: Masters of Resonance
926080.description: A journey from the Forest, to the Stage... Stars collide as John Good (known as the 'Wood Whisperer') crafts one of the most epic drum-sets of all time: The R40 played by Neil Peart on their final RUSH tour, made from a Romanian Bog Oak that is over 1500 years old! Through the eyes of some of the world’s most inspirational drummers ( John “JR” Robinson, Neil Peart, Duncan Phillips, Tommy Clufetos, Blair Sinta, Cobus Potgieter, Mona Tavakoli, Paul Wertico and many more) we peel back the curtain on the art of drum-making. Experience the interplay between Maker and Artist that blends passion with science in crafting one of the world’s most powerful instruments. Retrace the footsteps of humble beginnings for DW drums with Jeremy Bout (Edge Factor), that ultimately lead to the pivotal discovery that revolutionized the world of drumming forever! Immerse yourself in an inspirational journey of failure turned into success; where death gives birth to new life, and the world's greatest dreamers step into destiny to take their place along the “Masters of Resonance”. Starring: Jeremy Bout (Edge Factor), Neil Peart (Drummer: RUSH), John Good (Co-Founder: DW Drums), Don Lombardi (Founder: DW Drums), John “JR” Robinson (Drummer: Michael Jackson, Daft Punk, Madonna, Barbara Streisand, Eric Clapton), Cobus Potgieter (Drummer, YouTube Sensation), Blair Sinta (Drummer: Melissa Etheridge, Stevie Nicks, Josh Groban, Damien Rice, Annie Lennox, Idina Menzel, Chris Cornell, Alanis Morissette), Mona Tavakoli (Drummer, Jason Mraz), Duncan Phillips (Drummer: Newsboys), Ryan Brown (Drummer: Dweezil Zappa), Sheila E. (Drummer: Prince, Ringo Starr, Beyoncé, Marvin Gaye), Tommy Lee (Drummer: Mötley Crüe), Tommy Clufetos (Drummer: Black Sabbath, Alice Cooper, Ted Nugent, Rob Zombie), Vic Salazar (Drummer: Founder of Vics Drum Shop) Chad Wackerman (Drummer: Frank Zappa, Allan Holdsworth), Fausto Cuevas (Percussionist: Stevie Wonder, Jennifer Lopez, Britney Spears, Celia Cruz, Queen Latifah), Chad Smith (Drummer: Red Hot Chili Peppers).
